text:

name: CNN
text:
Last month, women's flag football became a collegiate sport.

This week, the NFL announced that 15 colleges have already committed to starting programs. The sport will create new full scholarship opportunities for women who'll begin to compete next spring. https://t.co/z2i9WwxtKB

name: CNN
